text: Dr. Maria Mendoza (@MariaGeriatrics) got her #COVID19 #vaccine at 31 weeks for her family, colleagues and community! If you have Qs about getting vaccinated while pregnant or breastfeeding, @HarvardHealth has some answers: https://t.co/Cg2MIdyjbh #ThisIsOurShot #MyCOVIDVax https://t.co/ePOWNASNCE
